item.title: Version 1.3.0
item.description:
Changes

  • The Windows Mixed Reality "Remixed" version of Revive is now in beta, open the Revive Dashboard on the desktop without SteamVR running to use it
  • The dashboard can now be opened on the desktop by double-clicking the tray icon or launching it from the start menu

Bug fixes

  • Fixed setting changes not being applied during gameplay
  • Fixed a crash in the dashboard when opening and closing it on the Desktop several times
  • Fixed a large portion of Oculus games failing to start (#960)
